objection_i_need_to_think_about_it.underlying_fear: Making wrong decision, not understanding options, need to consult spouse/partner
objection_i_need_to_think_about_it.authentic_response: Absolutely, this is an important decision. What specific aspects do you want to think through? I can provide additional information on those areas so you have everything you need. Also, what timeline works for you to revisit this?
objection_i_need_to_think_about_it.reframe: Position as collaborative thinking partner, not pushy salesperson

objection_too_expensive.underlying_fear: Can't afford proper protection, worried about budget strain
objection_too_expensive.authentic_response: I understand budget is important. Let's look at this differently - what would it cost if [SPECIFIC RISK] happened without coverage? We can also adjust deductibles or coverage limits to fit your budget while still protecting what matters most. What's your comfort zone?
objection_too_expensive.reframe: Cost of insurance vs cost of being uninsured, creative structuring options

objection_already_have_insurance.underlying_fear: Don't want to waste time, loyalty to current agent, hassle of switching
objection_already_have_insurance.authentic_response: That's great you're already covered. Most people we help already had insurance - they just discovered gaps or found they were overpaying. Would you be open to a complimentary coverage review to make sure you're getting the best value? No obligation to switch.
objection_already_have_insurance.reframe: Second opinion for peace of mind, not about switching but about verification

objection_dont_understand_insurance.underlying_fear: Looking stupid, making wrong choice due to ignorance, being taken advantage of
objection_dont_understand_insurance.authentic_response: That's exactly why people work with us instead of buying online. Insurance is intentionally complex - that's not your fault. I'll explain everything in plain English and make sure you understand exactly what you're getting before you commit to anything.
objection_dont_understand_insurance.reframe: Their confusion is normal and our expertise exists to solve that problem

objection_need_to_talk_to_spouse.underlying_fear: Making major financial decision alone, partner disagreement, lack of authority
objection_need_to_talk_to_spouse.authentic_response: Of course - this affects both of you. Would it be helpful if I joined a call with both of you so you can ask questions together? Or I can send you a summary to review together and we can reconnect when you've had a chance to discuss.
objection_need_to_talk_to_spouse.reframe: Include spouse in process, make it easier for them to have informed discussion

objection_had_bad_experience_before.underlying_fear: Being burned again, wasting money on coverage that won't pay, agent disappearing after sale
objection_had_bad_experience_before.authentic_response: I'm sorry that happened - it's more common than it should be. Can you tell me what went wrong? [Listen] Here's how we're different: [SPECIFIC PROCESSES]. And I don't get paid unless your claims get paid, so I'm incentivized to get you the right coverage, not just any coverage.
objection_had_bad_experience_before.reframe: Acknowledge pain, differentiate clearly, align incentives

objection_just_shopping_for_price.underlying_fear: Being sold more than they need, all insurance is the same, loyalty to lowest price
objection_just_shopping_for_price.authentic_response: Price definitely matters, and I'll work to get you competitive rates. But here's the thing - the cheapest policy is the most expensive if it doesn't cover your claim. Can I show you what to look for beyond price so you're comparing apples to apples? Then we'll make sure you get the best value.
objection_just_shopping_for_price.reframe: Educate on coverage differences, position as value advisor not just price quoter

objection_can_do_it_online_cheaper.underlying_fear: Paying unnecessary commission, agent is middleman adding no value
objection_can_do_it_online_cheaper.authentic_response: You can definitely buy online, and for simple situations that might work. The difference is when you have a claim or need changes - you're navigating that alone. We cost the same or less because we access wholesale markets you can't, and we're your advocate when it matters most. Worth a conversation?
objection_can_do_it_online_cheaper.reframe: Service value becomes apparent at claim time, broker access to markets, cost parity
